channel.title: OpenGL Botting?
channel.description:
Someone suggested i'd try to write a bot using OpenGL.
What exactly is involved in this kind of bot? I'm assuming you'd just intercept/rewrite the GL library that the client uses and then handle the render data such as comparing model vertices?
Anyone got any more information? Because this forum is pretty much other people asking about the same sort of thing.

item.title: OpenGL Botting?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
